com.navis.framework.portal

Class AttributeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.navis.framework.portal.AttributeUtils

  • public class AttributeUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains utility methods for attributes.
    Author:
    Arvinder Brar, Sep 10, 2010

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.Boolean getAttributeAsBoolean(java.lang.Object inAttribute)
      Returns the attribute as a Boolean.
      static java.lang.Boolean getAttributeAsBooleanOrDefault(java.lang.Object inAttribute, boolean inDefault)
      Returns the attribute as a Boolean.
      static java.lang.Integer getAttributeAsInteger(java.lang.Object inAttribute, java.lang.Integer inDefault)
      Return the Integer representation of a numeric value.
      static java.lang.Long getAttributeAsLong(java.lang.Object inAttribute, java.lang.Long inDefault)
      Return the Long representation of a numeric value.
      static MetafieldId getAttributeAsMetafieldId(java.lang.Object inAttribute)
      Returns the attribute as a MetafieldId; if not a MetafieldId or String, it returns null.
      static java.lang.String getAttributeAsString(java.lang.Object inAttribute)
      Returns the attribute as a String; if not a String, it returns null.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getAttributeAsMetafieldId

        @Nullable
public static MetafieldId getAttributeAsMetafieldId(java.lang.Object inAttribute)
        Returns the attribute as a MetafieldId; if not a MetafieldId or String, it returns null.
        Parameters:
        inAttribute - MetafieldId or String instance representing a metafield
        Returns:
        MetafieldId representing the attribute; otherwise, null

      • getAttributeAsString

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.String getAttributeAsString(java.lang.Object inAttribute)
        Returns the attribute as a String; if not a String, it returns null.
        Parameters:
        inAttribute - String instance representing an attribute
        Returns:
        String if inAttribute is String; otherwise null

      • getAttributeAsBoolean

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.Boolean getAttributeAsBoolean(java.lang.Object inAttribute)
        Returns the attribute as a Boolean.
        Parameters:
        inAttribute - Boolean or String instance representing a Boolean attribute
        Returns:
        Boolean true - only if inAttribute is Boolean and is true or inAttribute is a string which equals true (ignoring case) false - only if inAttribute is false or inAttribute is a string which equals false (ignoring case) In all other cases null is returned

      • getAttributeAsBooleanOrDefault

        @NotNull
public static java.lang.Boolean getAttributeAsBooleanOrDefault(java.lang.Object inAttribute,
                                                                         boolean inDefault)
        Returns the attribute as a Boolean. Always return Boolean.True or Boolean.false
        Parameters:
        inAttribute - Boolean or String instance of an attribute
        inDefault - boolean default value if instance not a valid Boolean representation
        Returns:
        Boolean true - if inAttribute is Boolean and is true or inAttribute is a string which equals true (ignoring case) false - if inAttribute is false or inAttribute is a string which equals false (ignoring case) In all other cases inDefault is returned

      • getAttributeAsInteger

        public static java.lang.Integer getAttributeAsInteger(java.lang.Object inAttribute,
                                                      java.lang.Integer inDefault)
        Return the Integer representation of a numeric value. If value passed is not numeric, it throws a Runtime exception.
        Parameters:
        inAttribute - Integer or String representation of a numeric value
        inDefault - Default value when attribute is a non-value (e.g. null, empty String).
        Returns:
        The value.

      • getAttributeAsLong

        public static java.lang.Long getAttributeAsLong(java.lang.Object inAttribute,
                                                java.lang.Long inDefault)
        Return the Long representation of a numeric value. If value passed is not numeric, it throws a Runtime exception.
        Parameters:
        inAttribute - Long, Integer or String representation of a numeric value
        inDefault - Default value when attribute is a non-value (e.g. null, empty String).
        Returns:
        The value.
